import React from 'react' import { Button, Header, Icon, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default function ModalAssignTask(props) { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) return (
setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} size='small' trigger={} >
Assign Task

{props.task.description}

) }
